Class SungkaGame

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SungkaGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Cups on the board are indexed as follows: 
       |14|13|12|11|10| 9| 8|
 15|--------------------| 7
   | 0| 1| 2| 3| 4| 5| 6|
